abstract: Americans have turned more negative on prospects for the stock market than at any time in the last 20 years, which may be good news for investors.
snippet: Americans have turned more negative on prospects for the stock market than at any time in the last 20 years, which may be good news for investors.
lead_paragraph: Americans have turned more negative on prospects for the stock market than at any time in the last 20 years. That may be good news for investors.

headline.main: Could Bear Talk Be a Contrary Signal?
headline.print_headline: Could Bear Talk Be a Contrary Signal?
